A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nothing short of spectacular--took me everywhere I wanted to go as a fan and to some places I didn't expect.  Many a touching homage to Carrie Fisher\, which I deeply appreciated and brought a few tears to my eyes.  Anyone should go and see this film\, and when you do\, if you are a fan--clear your mind\, focus.  Don't try to make this be the Star Wars story you think should be next.  Relax and listen to the story they are telling you.  If this is setting the table for Episode 9\, I can't wait to see what story they want to tell me next!
